question:
Which of the following are the criteria for census town?
  1. Minimum population of 5000
  2. At least 75% of male working population engaged in non-agricultural pursuits
  3. A density of population of at least 400 per sq.km
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Census town is defined as an area with minimum population of 5000. At least 75% of male working population engaged in non-agricultural pursuits and a density of population of at least 400 per sq. km
